MatchedSource.Content: [Domain]: Risk[Content]: Whilst John managed to get the front of his truck into the aisle, he hit and crushed a pallet waiting to the left, with the rear guide wheel. [InjuryNature]: None [LocationDetail]: Entry to Z02F [BodyPart]: None [InjuryCause]: None [IncidentPriority]: None [IncidentStatus]: Closed [RootCause]: Attitude-Behaviour [RoutineWork]: True [ShiftType]: Day [Title]: Unsafe Act/Condition form [ClosedByOperator]: True [ContractorName]: [DateClosed]: 13/07/2013 11:54:43 [DateIncidentOccurred]: 13/07/2013 [Miscellaneous]: --- [SolutionDescription]: [Recommendation: Removed from driving pending driver's committee decision; which was a four week ban and 3 points against his licence (this was not a first incident).];[Corrective Actions: John was re-trained and accessed in the week commencing 02/09/2013.];[Countermeasures: None]
